created_at.description: The creation date and time of the object.

updated_at.description: The last updated date and time of the object.

is_active.description: An active subscription refers to a subscription that has not yet expired.

cancellation_date.description: The date when subscription was canceled.

expiration_date.description: The date when subscription was expired.

buyer_uid.description: The actor of the action, the staff uid.

business_uid.description: The business that the subscription relates to.

purchase_price.description: The purchase price at the moment of the subscription was created.

purchase_currency.description: The purchase currency at the moment of the subscription was created.

payment_type.description: The payment type field defines the payment options available for a offering×ª 'free' - No payment is required; 'one_time' - A single, one-time payment is required to obtain the offering; 'monthly' - A recurring payment made on a monthly basis; 'annual' - A recurring payment made on a yearly basis; 'bundle' - A subscription bundled with another subscription

bundled_from_subscription_uid.description: The subscription uid that this subscription is bundled from
